imdb.plot outline: Fashion Central TV is the fashion lifestyle channel catering to a global market. We are the hub for fashion entertainment and fashion news, mixing new talent, major fashion designers, fashion video and fashion film, giving you hours of non stop entertainment. We will showcase the cutting edge of fashion from around the world in the palm of your hand. Fashion Central TV is a portal to the world of fashion, via the world wide web, a 24/7 channel available anytime and anywhere. The viewer has an all access backstage pass to what is happening in fashion. The who's who of the fashion world, top designers, stylist, fashion shows, photographers, fashion film, red carpet events, and new brands. Fashion Central TV is paving the way for the future, this is the next generation of fashion.
imdb.title: Fashion Central TV
